Posts.Content: sorry to hear about your dad. I'm 61 and just was diagnosed with prostate cancer. Gleason 3+4 PSA 7 After visiting 3 doctors not one of them suggested removing my prostate .. they said if I was 40 years old they would go that route but at 60 or over they believe treatment is better. I elected to go with cyberknife since its a 5 day treatment over the 9 week program good luck DD

Posts.Content: Hello all, I will have my markings placed tomorrow for the upcoming cyberknife treatment . should I expect that I will feel the same discomfort as the biopsy I had done? best Dan
